meanings.definition: The state or quality of being extremely cold or chilly.
meanings.sent1: The algidness of the ice made me shiver uncontrollably.
meanings.sent2: The algidness of the winter air nipped at my nose.
meanings.sent3: Despite the algidness outside, the children still played happily in the snow.
meanings.sent4: The algidness of her stare sent a chill down my spine.
meanings.sent5: The algidness of the frozen lake was breathtaking in its beauty.

meanings.definition: A feeling of extreme coldness or chilliness.
meanings.sent1: She wrapped herself in a blanket to ward off the algidness of the room.
meanings.sent2: The algidness of the wind made me pull my coat tighter around me.
meanings.sent3: The algidness of the ice cream gave me brain freeze.
meanings.sent4: The algidness of the situation left us all feeling isolated.
meanings.sent5: The algidness of the mountain air was invigorating during the hike.
